rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large open space with minimalist design and natural light, oriented in a favorable direction per Vastu for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Modern dining area adjacent to the living room; minimalistic decor with accent lighting.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional minimalist kitchen with an island counter and energy-efficient appliances. Positioned near water supply as per local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony oriented east for positivity; designed with ample storage and minimalist furniture.

rooms.name: Bedroom2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a small balcony for fresh air, ensuring privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with minimalist design; includes a private balcony.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Functional workspace designed for efficiency and comfort, oriented in a manner that supports focus per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern guest bathroom with minimalist fixtures; placed conveniently near the living area.

openings.description: Reinforced front door ensuring privacy and security.
Large window offering natural light and ventilation, positioned per Vastu guidelines.
Compliant with safety norms and local building codes.

rooms.name: Balcony Suite Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Bedroom with an expansive balcony overlooking the garden; minimalist design and optimal sunlight as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Balcony Suite Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Bedroom featuring a spacious balcony with privacy screens and open view for relaxation.

openings.description: Large windows ensuring natural light and ventilation while providing access to the balcony space.

rooms.name: Rooftop Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings; includes seating areas, greenery, and a private view.

openings.description: Well-lit staircase connecting levels ensuring easy access to the rooftop terrace.
Secure access door leading to the terrace, compliant with safety norms.
